001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
007import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ResponseSerializer;
008
009public interface HttpExceptionFactory {
010
011    ResponseSerializer getResponseSerializer();
012
013    public default ApiHttpException create(final ApiHttpRequest request, final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
014        if (response.getStatusCode() >= 500) {
015            return createServerException(request, response);
016        }
017        return createClientException(request, response);
018    }
019
020    public default ApiHttpException createServerException(final ApiHttpRequest request,
021            final ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
022        final ResponseSerializer serializer = getResponseSerializer();
023        String message = "Server error response [url] " + request.getUri().toString() + " [status code] "
024                + response.getStatusCode() + " [reason phrase] " + response.getMessage();
025
026        switch (response.getStatusCode()) {
027            case 500:
028                return new InternalServerErrorException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
029                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
030            case 502:
031                return new BadGatewayException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
032                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
033            case 503:
034                return new ServiceUnavailableException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
035                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
036            case 504:
037                return new GatewayTimeoutException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
038                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
039        }
040        return new ApiServerException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()), response.getHeaders(),
041            message, response, request);
042    }
043
044    public default ApiHttpException createClientException(ApiHttpRequest request, ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
045        final ResponseSerializer serializer = getResponseSerializer();
046        String message = "Client error response [url] " + request.getUri().toString() + " [status code] "
047                + response.getStatusCode() + " [reason phrase] " + response.getMessage();
048
049        switch (response.getStatusCode()) {
050            case 400:
051                return new BadRequestException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
052                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
053            case 401:
054                return new UnauthorizedException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
055                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
056            case 403:
057                return new ForbiddenException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
058                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
059            case 404:
060                return new NotFoundException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
061                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
062            case 409:
063                return new ConcurrentModificationException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()),
064                    request.getHeaders(), message, response, request, serializer);
065        }
066        return new ApiClientException(response.getStatusCode(), new String(response.getBody()), response.getHeaders(),
067            message, response, request);
068    }
069
070    public static HttpExceptionFactory of(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
071        return new DefaultHttpExceptionFactory(serializer);
072    }
073}
